metadata.title: CVE-2024-27007 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:userfaultfd: change src_folio after ensuring it's unpinned in UFFDIO_MOVECommit d7a08838ab74 ("mm: userfaultfd: fix unexpected change to src_foliowhen UFFDIO_MOVE fails") moved the src_folio->{mapping, index} changing toafter clearing the page-table and ensuring that it's not pinned.  Thisavoids failure of swapout+migration and possibly memory corruption.However, the commit missed fixing it in the huge-page case.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
